thread.title: Winnipeg Jets vs. Devils: LIVE updates, analysis and fan chat
thread.title_full: Winnipeg Jets vs. Devils: LIVE updates, analysis and fan chat | NJ.com

author: Rich Chere | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
title: Winnipeg Jets vs. Devils: LIVE updates, analysis and fan chat
text:
• Analysis and fan talk flow in the comments section below. Join in!
• For the latest news and updates, REFRESH this page frequently.
• App users: For the best mobile experience, use the mobile web version .
SECOND PERIOD
The Devils killed off the final 39 seconds of a Winnipeg power play, but the Jets took a 1-0 lead at 1:13 when Mark Scheifele wristed a shot from the left circle that beat Schneider up high. The puck hit the crossbar and went in.
Blake Wheeler's wrist shot at 3:59, also from the left circle, made it a 2-0 game. The goal was originally waved off, but a video review showed that it went in.
The Devils scored on the power play at 12:53 after Tyler Myers was called for interference. Jiri Tlusty's shot went off Jacob Trouba to cut the deficit in half.
However, Andrew Lass scored on a one-timer from the right circle at 16:21. It came during a power play with Reid Boucher in the box for delay of game.
End of period: Jets 3, Devils 1
Shots were 23-11 Winnipeg
FIRST PERIOD Cory Schneider started in goal against Michael Hutchinson.
Devils' lines:
Cammalleri-Zajac-Stempniak
Henrique-Josefson-Palmieri
Boucher-Kalinin-Tlusty
Ruutu-Gionta-Tootoo
Devils' defense:
Greene-Larsson
Merrill-Moore
Schlemko-Severson
The Devils had the first three shots on goal in the game, but were outshot, 12-1 the rest of the period.
End of period: Devils 0, Jets 0
Shots were 12-4 Winnipeg
This is your place to do it, fans. Chime in with your thoughts in the comments section below. I'll be posting analysis, observations and general missives throughout the game.
